verses.verse: "Arise,<WH6965> shine;<WH215> for your light<WH216> has come,<WH935> and the glory<WH3519> of Yahweh<WH3068> is risen on you.<WH2224>

For,<WH2822> behold, darkness shall cover<WH3680> the earth,<WH776> and gross darkness<WH6205> the peoples;<WH3816> but Yahweh<WH3068> will arise<WH2224> on you,<WH3519> and his glory shall be seen on you.<WH7200>
Nations<WH1471> shall come<WH1980> to your light,<WH216> and kings<WH4428> to the brightness<WH5051> of your rising.<WH2225>

"Lift up<WH5375> your eyes<WH5869> all around,<WH5439> and see:<WH7200> they all gather themselves together,<WH6908> they come<WH935> to you;<WH1121> your sons shall come<WH935> from far,<WH7350> and your daughters<WH1323> shall be carried<WH539> in the arms.<WH6654>

Then you shall see<WH7200> and be radiant,<WH5102> and your heart<WH3824> shall thrill<WH6342> and be enlarged;<WH7337> because the abundance<WH1995> of the sea<WH3220> shall be turned<WH2015> to you,<WH2428> the wealth of the nations<WH1471> shall come to you.<WH935>

The multitude<WH8229> of camels<WH1581> shall cover<WH3680> you,<WH1070> the dromedaries of Midian<WH4080> and Ephah;<WH5891> all they from Sheba<WH7614> shall come;<WH935> they shall bring<WH5375> gold<WH2091> and frankincense,<WH3828> and shall proclaim<WH1319> the praises<WH8416> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

All the flocks<WH6629> of Kedar<WH6938> shall be gathered together<WH6908> to you,<WH352> the rams of Nebaioth<WH5032> shall minister<WH8334> to you;<WH5927> they shall come up with acceptance<WH7522> on my altar;<WH4196> and I will glorify<WH6286> the house<WH1004> of my glory.<WH8597>
"Who are these who fly<WH5774> as a cloud,<WH5645> and as the doves<WH3123> to their windows?<WH699>

Surely the islands<WH339> shall wait<WH6960> for me,<WH591> and the ships of Tarshish<WH8659> first,<WH7223> to bring<WH935> your sons<WH1121> from far,<WH7350> their silver<WH3701> and their gold<WH2091> with them,<WH8034> for the name of Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and for the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel,<WH3478> because he has glorified you.<WH6286>

"Foreigners<WH5236> shall build up<WH1129> your walls,<WH2346> and their kings<WH4428> shall minister<WH8334> to you:<WH7110> for in my wrath I struck<WH5221> you,<WH7522> but in my favor have I had mercy on you.<WH7355>

Your gates<WH8179> also shall be open<WH6605> continually;<WH8548> they shall not be shut<WH5462> day<WH3119> nor night;<WH3915> that men may bring<WH935> to you the wealth<WH2428> of the nations,<WH1471> and their kings<WH4428> led captive.<WH5090>
For that nation<WH1471> and kingdom<WH4467> that will not serve<WH5647> you shall perish;<WH6> yes,<WH1471> those nations shall be utterly<WH2717> wasted.<WH2717>

"The glory<WH3519> of Lebanon<WH3844> shall come<WH935> to you,<WH1265> the fir tree, the pine,<WH8410> and the box tree<WH8410> together,<WH3162> to beautify<WH6286> the place<WH4725> of my sanctuary;<WH4720> and I will make the place<WH4725> of my feet<WH7272> glorious.<WH3513>

The sons<WH1121> of those who afflicted<WH6031> you shall come<WH1980> bending<WH7817> to you;<WH5006> and all those who despised you shall bow themselves down<WH7812> at the soles<WH3709> of your feet;<WH7272> and they shall call<WH7121> you The city<WH5892> of Yahweh,<WH3068> The Zion<WH6726> of the Holy One<WH6918> of Israel.<WH3478>

"Whereas<WH8478> you have been forsaken<WH5800> and hated,<WH8130> so that no man passed through<WH5674> you,<WH7760> I will make you an eternal<WH5769> excellency,<WH1347> a joy<WH4885> of many<WH1755> generations.<WH1755>

You shall also drink<WH3243> the milk<WH2461> of the nations,<WH1471> and shall nurse<WH3243> from royal<WH4428> breasts;<WH7699> and you shall know<WH3045> that I,<WH3068> Yahweh, am your Savior,<WH3467> and your Redeemer,<WH1350> the Mighty One<WH46> of Jacob.<WH3290>

For brass<WH5178> I will bring<WH935> gold,<WH2091> and for iron<WH1270> I will bring<WH935> silver,<WH3701> and for wood<WH6086> brass,<WH5178> and for stones<WH68> iron.<WH1270> I will also make<WH7760> your officers<WH6486> peace,<WH7965> and righteousness<WH6666> your ruler.<WH5065>

Violence<WH2555> shall no more be heard<WH8085> in your land,<WH776> desolation<WH7701> nor destruction<WH7667> within your borders;<WH1366> but you shall call<WH7121> your walls<WH2346> Salvation,<WH3444> and your gates<WH8179> Praise.<WH8416>

The sun<WH8121> shall be no more your light<WH216> by day;<WH3119> neither for brightness<WH5051> shall the moon<WH3394> give light<WH216> to you:<WH3068> but Yahweh will be to you an everlasting<WH5769> light,<WH215> and your God<WH430> your glory.<WH8597>

Your sun<WH8121> shall no more go down,<WH935> neither shall your moon<WH3391> withdraw<WH622> itself;<WH3068> for Yahweh will be your everlasting<WH5769> light,<WH216> and the days<WH3117> of your mourning<WH60> shall be ended.<WH7999>

Your people<WH5971> also shall be all righteous;<WH6662> they shall inherit<WH3423> the land<WH776> forever,<WH5769> the branch<WH5342> of my planting,<WH4302> the work<WH4639> of my hands,<WH3027> that I may be glorified.<WH6286>
The little one<WH6996> shall become a thousand,<WH505> and the small one<WH6810> a strong<WH6099> nation;<WH1471> I,<WH3068> Yahweh, will hasten<WH2363> it in its time.<WH6256>"
